revised_title: Vibrational Analysis and Dissociation Energies of Bismuth Fluoride
tldr: The authors studied the emission spectrum of bismuth fluoride (BiF) and conducted a vibrational analysis of its spectrum. They found that the emitting molecule is diatomic and has a Condon parabola typical of fluoride bands. The authors also discussed dissociation energies and the possibility of excited bismuth being involved in the dissociation process.
